"Randy!"

"Hmm, fitting, I guess." You replied. Since they revealed to you, a thought occurred to you. Should you reveal your identity to them?
1412311.title: Invite Her into your Room for Some "Punishm...

15.title: Somebody else

info.brief_description: Inspired by the original two Pokemon Possession stories that I heavily contributed to.
info.description:
You are an experienced Trainer from the Hoenn Region. You've lived here for about a year now since moving from the Johto Region, and have made a decent name for yourself. Now you've received a call about a new experimental app for your PokeNav that was downloaded to your phone, and are curious to check it out. Turns out this app lets you 'navigate' your way into the bodies of any woman you have the number of! Now your new journey is ready to begin.


Characters:

Ian - "Insert A Name," aka you. You're an average guy who's interested in seeing how this new app plays out.

May - Your "rival." She's more concerned about being your friend then offering to battle, but damn if she isn't pretty hot.

Norman - Your Father and leader of the Petalburg Gym. He spends a lot of time at the Gym and you don't see him very often.

Alice - Your stay at home Mother.

Gym Leaders and Elite Four - Roxanne, Flannery, Winona, Liza, Phoebe, Glacia

Frontier Brains - Greta, Lucy, Anabel

Aqua and Magma - Shelly and Courtney

The basic rules of this story are as follows;

1. No killing off the Main Character
2. No possessing Pokemon or Male Trainers
3. Anything goes sex wise
4. Everyone in this story is at least 18.
5. For the most part, this story uses the designs of the ORAS remakes.

Don't be afraid to add new chapters!
